intro: Hunt down a Yokai that cannot tell a lie — using words and Suspicious. A fresh take on a Werewolf-style social deduction adventure.
description:
After you inherit a small apartment from your late father, a mysterious man appears.
“There’s a Yokai hiding among your tenants.”
And that Yokai cannot lie.
From subtle Suspicious at the edges of their words to events that don’t add up,
you’ll tug on every loose thread as your life as a landlord-detective begins.

<Overview>
Play from the landlord’s perspective and identify the Yokai that cannot lie, then present your evidence, persuade them, and evict them in this Werewolf-style social deduction adventure. The story unfolds across multiple chapters. As each chapter passes, the seasons change, and with every eviction new tenants—and new Yokai—move in, reshaping the web of relationships. In every chapter your goal is to deduce who the Yokai is and protect your beloved apartment from them.
 Why do Yokai gather in your building? And what is the true intent of the mysterious man who warned you? Those mysteries lie at the heart of the story for you to uncover.

In a world where connections feel thinner than ever, conversations with your tenants gradually build trust.
Beyond simple puzzle-solving, a quiet, heartwarming tale of growth and understanding awaits you.

<Talking with the Tenants>
At first, no one really trusts the landlord. Take notes on everyday chats, complaints, and idle small talk, and look for Suspicious you can follow up on. Only the Yokai cannot lie—so somewhere, a seam will show.

<Proof and Eviction>
Saying “You’re suspicious” won’t make anyone move out. Gather proof that the other tenants are human and line up your Suspicious clues to box the culprit in with logic until they confess. Evicting a human by mistake only breeds distrust among those who remain — exactly what the Yokai wants.

<Time’s Up>
On the new moon of Week 5, the Yokai reveals its true power.
If you haven’t evicted them by then, there’s nothing a human can do.
Make every day count — observe, follow the Suspicious, deduce, and close in before time runs out.
